header.v: Tồn tại khai báo đã có phát sinh liên quan, không thể ghi đè.
header.e: There existed a declaration has data constraints, the data cannot be overwritten.

header.v: Nhà cung cấp chưa khai báo đánh giá nhà cung cấp.
header.e: Vendor has not been configured for vendor evaluation.

header.v: Mã hàng chưa khai báo đánh giá nhà cung cấp.
header.e: Item has not been configured for vendor evaluation.

header.v: Mã chỉ tiêu và mã hàng trùng nhau trong chi tiết.
header.e: The sub criterion code and item already exists.

header.v: Trường kỳ/năm đánh giá chưa nhập hoặc giá trị nhập không hợp lệ.
header.e: Field evaluation period/year must not be blank or has invalid value.

field.name: ma_bp0
field.check: ma_bp0 not in (select ma_bp from bidmbp0)&Enter;not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where @@table.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @@userID and b.r_new = 1)

field.name: loai_ky
field.check: loai_ky not in (select ma_loai from bidmlkdg)

field.name: ma_chi_tieu
field.check: ma_chi_tieu <> '' and ma_chi_tieu not in (select ma_ct from bidmctdg where kieu_tinh = '3')

field.name: ma_vt
field.check: ma_vt <> '' and ma_vt not in (select ma_vt from dmvt)

text.v: Cập nhật điểm theo kỳ đánh giá

processing.text: declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @wsID varchar(1), @datetime0 datetime, @message nvarchar(4000) declare @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @k int, @count int, @voucherID varchar(8), @vendorNotConfig nvarchar(4000), @itemNotConfig nvarchar(4000), @duplicate nvarchar(4000), @periodInvalid nvarchar(4000), @yearInvalid nvarchar(4000) select @wsID = rtrim(val) from options where rtrim(name) = 'm_ws_id' select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @voucherID = 'P05', @datetime0 = getdate() select @vendorNotConfig = case @@language when 'v' then N'Nhà cung cấp tại ô %invalidCell chưa khai báo đánh giá nhà cung cấp.' else 'The vendor of cell %invalidCell has not been configured for vendor evaluation.' end select @itemNotConfig = case @@language when 'v' then N'Mã hàng tại ô %invalidCell chưa khai báo đánh giá nhà cung cấp.' else 'The item of cell %invalidCell has not been configured for vendor evaluation.' end select @duplicate = case @@language when 'v' then N'&s1; trùng nhau trong phần thông tin chi tiết.' else '&s2; already exists in detail data.' end select @periodInvalid = case @@language when 'v' then N'Kỳ/năm tại ô %invalidCell chưa nhập hoặc giá trị nhập không hợp lệ.' else 'The period/year of cell %invalidCell must not be blank or has invalid value.' end -- Check @@checking if @admin <> 1 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'BIScoreEvaluationPeriod', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a join bim05$000000 b on &k0; -- stt_rec0, line_nbr select identity(int, 1, 1) as id, cast(stt as int) as stt, rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(loai_ky) + rtrim(ky) + rtrim(nam) + rtrim(ma_kh) as c, cast(0 as int) as ln into #ln from @@table order by ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh, stt exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateLineNumber create index i on #ln(stt) if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ky', a.stt, 'C008' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bictdmlkdg b where a.loai_ky = b.ma_loai and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky and b.status = '1') &w1;'ky'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C008'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ky', @message = '', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bictdmlkdg b where a.loai_ky = b.ma_loai and a.nam = b.nam and a.ky = b.ky and b.status = '1')&Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_chi_tieu', a.stt, 'C006' from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and &k0; and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.ma_vt <> '' &w1;'ma_chi_tieu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C006'&w4; &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_chi_tieu', a.stt, 'C006' from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and &k0; and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and a.ma_vt = '' &w1;'ma_chi_tieu'&w2;a.stt&w3;'C006'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_chi_tieu', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and &k0; and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt where a.ma_vt <> '' if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', rtrim(ma_chi_tieu)), '%s2', rtrim(ma_vt)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end select @field = 'ma_chi_tieu', @r = min(a.stt) from @@table a join (select * from @@table) b on a.stt <> b.stt and &k0; and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and a.ma_vt = '' if @r is not null begin select replace(replace(replace(@duplicate, '%s1', rtrim(ma_chi_tieu)), '%s2', rtrim(ma_vt)), '%s3', @@delta + @r) as message from @@table where stt = @r return end end select a.ma_bp0, max(b.ngay_hieu_luc) as ngay_hieu_luc into #m03hl from #table a join bim03$000000 b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.ngay_hieu_luc <= (select ngay_ct2 from bictdmlkdg where ma_loai = a.loai_ky and nam = a.nam and ky = a.ky) group by a.ma_bp0 select b.ma_bp0, a.ma_loai, a.ma_chi_tieu, a.kieu_nhap, isnull(b.diem_toi_thieu, 0) as diem_toi_thieu, isnull(b.diem_toi_da, 0) as diem_toi_da into #e03 from bie03$000000 a join (select a.ma_bp0, a.diem_toi_thieu, a.diem_toi_da, stt_rec from bim03$000000 a join #m03hl b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ngay_hieu_luc = b.ngay_hieu_luc) b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, '00002' from @@table a where (a.ma_vt = '' and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and b.kieu_nhap = '1')) or (a.ma_vt <> '' and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and b.kieu_nhap = '2')) or (a.ma_vt <> '' and not exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu)) &w1;'ma_vt'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_vt', @message = '', @r = min(stt) from @@table a where (a.ma_vt = '' and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and b.kieu_nhap = '1')) or (a.ma_vt <> '' and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and b.kieu_nhap = '2')) or (a.ma_vt <> '' and not exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu))&Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'diem', stt, '00002' from @@table a where a.diem <> 0 and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and ((b.diem_toi_thieu <> 0 and (a.diem < b.diem_toi_thieu)) or (b.diem_toi_da <> 0 and (a.diem > b.diem_toi_da)))) &w1;'diem'&w2;stt&w3;'00002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'diem', @message = '', @r = min(stt) from @@table a where a.diem <> 0 and exists(select 1 from #e03 b where a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.ma_chi_tieu = b.ma_chi_tieu and ((b.diem_toi_thieu <> 0 and (a.diem < b.diem_toi_thieu)) or (b.diem_toi_da <> 0 and (a.diem > b.diem_toi_da))))&Error; end if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_kh', stt, 'C003' from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmncctsbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmnccts b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') &w1;'ma_kh'&w2;stt&w3;'C003'&w4; &EndErrorCount; &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_vt', stt, 'C005' from @@table a where a.ma_vt <> '' and not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsbp0 b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmvtts b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') &w1;'ma_vt'&w2;stt&w3;'C005'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_kh', @message = @vendorNotConfig, @r = min(stt) from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from bidmncctsbp0 b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmnccts b where a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1')&Error; select @field = 'ma_vt', @message = @itemNotConfig, @r = min(stt) from @@table a where a.ma_vt <> '' and not exists(select 1 from bidmvttsbp0 b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1') and not exists(select 1 from bidmvtts b where a.ma_vt = b.ma_vt and b.name = 'danh_gia_ncc' and b.val = '1')&Error; end select a.*, b.stt_rec into #k from @@table a join bim05$000000 b on &k0; delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where &k0;) if @@admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @$mode = 1 begin &StartErrorCount; &InsertErrorTable; select 'ma_bp0', stt, 'C002' from #k where not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where #k.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1) &w1;'ma_bp0'&w2;stt&w3;'C002'&w4; &EndErrorCount; end else begin select @field = 'ma_bp0', @message = '', @r = min(stt) from #k where not exists(select 1 from bisyspurorgrights b where #k.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and b.user_id = @user and b.r_edit = 1)&Error; end end &EndErrorMode; select top 0 stt_rec, ma_ct, ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh, dien_giai, status into #m05 from bim05$000000 select top 0 stt_rec, stt_rec0, line_nbr, ma_ct, ma_chi_tieu, ma_vt, diem, ghi_chu into #d05 from bid05$000000 select top 0 stt_rec, ngay_ct, so_ct, ma_bp0, ky, nam, c$, m$, d$, status, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #i05 from bii05$000000 select @count = count(*) from @@table if @count > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id1 from bim05$000000 insert into #id1 select '', ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh, min(stt) from @@table group by ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh select @k = count(*) from #id1 exec AI_ERP$App$UpdateIdentityNumber @wsID, @voucherID, @k, @@userID, '#id1' insert into #m05 select b.stt_rec, @voucherID, a.ma_bp0, a.loai_ky, a.ky, a.nam, a.ma_kh, a.dien_giai, 1 from @@table a join #id1 b on a.stt = b.stt insert into #d05 select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, @voucherID, a.ma_chi_tieu, a.ma_vt, a.diem, a.ghi_chu from @@table a join #id1 b on &k0; join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt insert into #i05 select stt_rec, null, '', ma_bp0, ky, nam, rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(loai_ky) + rtrim(nam) + rtrim(ky) + rtrim(ma_kh) + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#20$' + rtrim(loai_ky) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_kh), '', status from #m05 select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i05', '#d05', 'd$', 'ma_chi_tieu, ma_vt', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- Insert/Update @@inserting(master); @@inserting(detail); @@inserting(inquiry); end if @type = '1' begin select @k = count(*) from #k if @k > 0 begin select top 0 stt_rec, ma_bp0, loai_ky, ky, nam, ma_kh, cast(0 as int) as stt, identity(int, 1, 1) as id into #id2 from bim05$000000 insert into #id2 select b.stt_rec, a.ma_bp0, a.loai_ky, a.ky, a.nam, a.ma_kh, min(a.stt) from #k a join bim05$000000 b on a.ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0 and a.loai_ky = b.loai_ky and a.ky = b.ky and a.nam = b.nam and a.ma_kh = b.ma_kh group by a.ma_bp0, a.loai_ky, a.ky, a.nam, a.ma_kh, b.stt_rec -- truncate table #m05 insert into #m05 select a.stt_rec, @voucherID, a.ma_bp0, a.loai_ky, a.ky, a.nam, a.ma_kh, a.dien_giai, 1 from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt = b.stt truncate table #d05 insert into #d05 select b.stt_rec, dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Voucher$GetRecordsGroup(i.ln), i.ln, @voucherID, a.ma_chi_tieu, a.ma_vt, a.diem, a.ghi_chu from #k a join #id2 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec join #ln i on a.stt = i.stt truncate table #i05 insert into #i05 select stt_rec, null, '', ma_bp0, ky, nam, rtrim(ma_bp0) + rtrim(loai_ky) + rtrim(nam) + rtrim(ky) + rtrim(ma_kh) + stt_rec, '#10$' + rtrim(ma_bp0) + '#20$' + rtrim(loai_ky) + '#30$' + rtrim(ma_kh), '', status from #m05 select @q = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$Update$Inquiry('#i05', '#d05', 'd$', 'ma_chi_tieu, ma_vt', '#10$, #20$', 'stt_rec', default, default, default, default, default) exec sp_executesql @q -- update bim05$000000 set dien_giai = b.dien_giai, datetime2 = @datetime0, user_id2 = @user from bim05$000000 a join #m05 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec delete bid05$000000 where stt_rec in (select distinct stt_rec from #id2) @@inserting(detail); update bii05$000000 set c$ = b.c$, d$ = b.d$, m$ = b.m$, ma_bp0 = b.ma_bp0, ky = b.ky, nam = b.nam from bii05$000000 a join #i05 b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec end end
